title: eave - The New Shopping Experience
description: 3D virtual and collaborative shopping environment created with my partner Naeem Hassan. I created and implemented the user interface and the environment and interaction logic.

title: TurboDOMBuilder
description: A lightweight JavaScript library to easily create DOM elements, and that provide basic interaction-centric components suited for customization, and a utility to easily manage CSS styling and transitions. This portfolio website was actually created using TurboDOMBuilder! You can check out the source code here.

title: Upool Carpooling System
description: Designed a transportation solution for university students in Lebanon.

title: Child Bullying Visualization
description: An interactive visualization created with my teammate Andreas Charalambides that depicts Argentinian children's probability of getting bullied based on different characteristics.

title: 3D Animations
description: Two 3D animation I created completely from scratch. The first one was created to an audio taken from CNNâ€™s Colorscope series.

title: Invisible Haunted Mansion
description: An immersive ghost-hunting game created in a group project where the player catches ghosts in their physical room using their smartphone/wearable device with auditory and haptic  feedback. I implemented the interface and the game logic.
